summary.para: Retrieves the available browser frame view options.

param.name: dwMask
param.para: Specifies the options requested as a bitwise combination of one or more of the constants of enumeration type .

param.name: pdwOptions
param.para: When this method returns, contains the options that the view can enable (for example, ). This value is not optional and is always equal to, or a subset of, the options specified by dwMask.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: If the method succeeds, the return value is S_OK and pdwOptions contains the subset of available view options. If the method fails, pdwOptions is set to BFO_NONE.

summary.para: Allows a browser or host to ask what kind of view behavior is supported.
